blogs.title: Athletic Directors Ready to Pursue Collegiate Esports
blogs.author: Jesse Bodony
blogs.description: This blog post is derived from the Uni Esports Group white paper, titled “State of the Game: Collegiate Esports and The Future of Gaming in Higher Education.” Over a month-long period, we sent a survey to 2,047 Athletic Directors from across the country. Our survey included questions designed to assess respondents’ understanding of esports, their perceptions of what value an esports program could offer to their school community, and their sense of where the greatest obstacles exist to creating a program.
